title: The Hidden world: a study of insects
creator_credit: Jack Haley, Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Wolper Productions
brief_description: Demonstrates how insects can be controlled to ensure human protection from illness. Shows how a bee tells other bees where to find flower nectar, and how winged termites are sent from one home colony to found new colonies.
